articles.title: Study gives insight into post-exertional malaise in Long COVID patients - WSWS
articles.description: The study fills several gaps in our knowledge and helps improve our understanding of post-exertional malaise in Long COVID, confirming that patients with the condition get worse, not better, with exercise.
